questions: Can you share an inspirational quote?
answers: I don't have personal favorites, but here's an inspirational quote: 'The only way to do great work is to love what you do.' - Steve Jobs
Here's a famous quote: 'In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.' - Robert Frost
While I don't have personal preferences, I can share popular quotes and sayings on various topics.
